List

* unordered list
    + sub-item 1
    + sub-item 2
        - sub-sub-item 1
* undordered list2  
    Countinued(indent 4 spaces)

1. ordered list
2. item 2
    i) sub-item 1
         A.  sub-sub-item 1
  • unordered list
    • sub-item 1
    • sub-item 2
      • sub-sub-item 1
  • undordered list2
    Countinued(indent 4 spaces)
  1. ordered list
  2. item 2
    1. sub-item 1
      1. sub-sub-item 1
